title: Obsidian
description: An epic adventure where you help Anubis rebuild the Great Library. Dive into portals to explore enchanted books' worlds, facing themed enemies, platforming challenges, and group puzzles. Earn crafting resources to create real E-Books and unlock powerful spells.
